definition: Parthenon Temple on the Acropolis, Athens
Parthenon Temple on the Acropolis, Athens (Tw)

sentences.english: We enter the temple of the God of wealth will feel the feeling of beautiful decoration.
sentences.chinese: 我们进入财神庙便会感到金碧辉煌的感觉。

sentences.english: Mr Fukuda, by contrast, has a family legacy to enshrine.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，福田康夫有参拜神庙的家庭传统。

sentences.english: The best preserved temple of Egyptian antiquity in Edfu.
sentences.chinese: 埃德福神庙是埃及至今保存最完好的神庙。

sentences.english: The best preserved temple of Egyptian antiquity in Edfu.
sentences.chinese: 埃德福神庙是埃及至今保存最完好的神庙。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the temple is believed to have escaped any damage.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，神庙毫发无伤。

sentences.english: On the top of the Acropolis is the Parthenon.
sentences.chinese: 卫城的顶端是怕台农神庙。

sentences.english: Karnak temple site in Luxor, Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 斯特卡纳神庙遗址，墙壁满位老壁。

sentences.english: In the jungles of 1)Guatemala, in Tikal, stands a temple.
sentences.chinese: 在危地马拉丛林深处的蒂卡尔，矗立着一座神庙。

sentences.english: The church will be built where there used to be a Roman temple.
sentences.chinese: 教堂将建在曾是一个罗马神庙的地方。

sentences.english: The first stop on most excursions is the Parthenon on the hill of the Acropolis.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数游览的第一站是在雅典卫城帕特农神庙山。

sentences.english: The wish I want to see Wisdom Goddess Temple becomes stronger and …
sentences.chinese: 我想看智慧女神庙的愿望越来越强烈了。

sentences.english: In this city is one of the most revered temples, that of Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 阿波罗神庙是这座城市里最受敬仰的神庙之一。

sentences.english: In this city is one of the most revered temples, that of Apollo.
sentences.chinese: 阿波罗神庙是这座城市里最受敬仰的神庙之一。

sentences.english: The temple stands, however, and the words are here.
sentences.chinese: 而神庙还在，这些祭文也在这里。

sentences.english: Cuzco, the royal palace with large gold and silver, it is very spectacular temple of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 库斯科的王宫拥有大量金银，它的太阳神庙非常壮观。

sentences.english: Number two on the list is Karnak temple that is situated neat Luxor, Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 排在第二位的是卡纳克神庙，它位于埃及的卢克索。

to offer sacrifices to the gods or ancestors
